sentence.Network_en: They stumble across a ghost town inhabited by a rascally gold prospector.

entry.tran: 流氓的；无赖的；卑鄙的；狡诈的
entry.def: If you describe someone as a rascally person, you mean that they behave badly and are wicked or dishonest.

example.ex: They stumble across a ghost town inhabited by a rascally gold prospector.
example.tran: 他们偶然来到一个居住着一位狡诈的淘金者的废墟之城。

means.word_mean: 1. playful in an appealingly bold way;

"the captain was set adrift by his roguish crew"
